contents: Article 21 (Registration Change) ① If an athlete wishes to change his/her organization or registration location, he/she must change his/her registration and submit a transfer consent form to the member sport organization. ② The transfer consent for registration change shall be given by the head of the affiliated organization before the change. However, in the following cases, the heads of city/provincial sports organizations may give consent. 1. If the school does not have an athletics department but belongs to the school. 2. If only the registration is changed due to reasons such as relocation of the affiliated organization. ③ Notwithstanding paragraph 1, a transfer consent form is not required in the following cases. 1. In the case of athletes under the age of 12, revised on May 4, 2023. In the case of athletes belonging to middle or high schools who advance or transfer within the same city or province. 3. In the case of athletes belonging to other middle or high schools in the same city or province, there is no athletics department. In case of admission or transfer to a city/province 4. A member of a school's athletics department who is admitted or transferred to a middle or high school in another city/province due to the school disbanding its athletics department and the insufficient number of students in the athletics department for the same sport in the city/province. 5. When a player belonging to a sports club changes between sports clubs within the same city/province 6. When the guardian of a player under the age of 15 or under 18 moves his or her residence to maintain a living, and all family members move. When the fact of entry is confirmed. Revised 2023. 5. 4. 7. When an athlete under the age of 18 enters college. Amended 2023. 5. 4. 8. When an athlete from the under-18 or university team joins the workplace sports department after graduation. When registering as a general department, etc. Revised 2023. 5. 4. 9. When the affiliation changes due to military service or due to military service 10. When the affiliated organization is disbanded and the contract with the affiliated workplace sports department expires 11. Injury, 12. When a former athlete is not registered but registers after 2 years from the date of the last athlete registration application 13. When an athlete registered for the purpose of recreational sports transfers
